io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a chess board. It wraps a Position, and provides helper methods to access and/or update it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructs a new board, using a standard starting chess position.

    • Method Detail

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece(char col,
             int row)
        Parameters:
        col - Which column to look at.
        row - Which row to look at.
        Returns:
        the Piece located at the coordinates (column, row).

      • play

        public void play(java.util.List<Move> moves)
          throws IllegalMoveException
        Helper method which plays a list of moves upon the contained Position.
        Parameters:
        moves - The moves to be applied onto the position, always starting with the first move of the game.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException - When the move is not valid in regards of the position.
